0.1.0.name: connect20/Buzzthemes_Watch_Store_Template
0.1.0.description: A harmonious combination of black and light colors makes this template luxurious and perfectly suitable for Magento stores selling watch and accessories. With simple layout and easy navigation, the template becomes very friendly and eye-catching with users.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
